patentDB.m_MARKMANALL: SELECT TOP 1000 patents.PMCRef, patents.PatentPath, patents.PatentNumber, claims.ClaimNumber, mt.ClaimTerm, mc.Construction, mc.MarkmanPage, document.DocumentPath, document.FileName, client.ClientName, mc.Court, mc.Agreed FROM Claim claims INNER JOIN Patent AS patents ON patents.PatentID = claims.PatentID INNER JOIN MarkmanTermConstruction AS mtc ON mtc.ClaimID = claims.ClaimID INNER JOIN MarkmanTerms AS mt ON mt.TermID = mtc.TermID INNER JOIN MarkmanConstructions AS mc ON mc.ConstructID = mtc.ConstructID INNER JOIN Document AS document ON document.DocumentID = mc.DocumentID INNER JOIN Client AS client ON client.ClientID = mtc.ClientID
